text: New co - showrunner Krista Vernoff, who returned to the Shondaland drama after working as a writer for its first seven seasons, talks with THR about the ups and downs of the two - hour opener. [ This story contains spoilers from the two - hour Grey's Anatomy season 14 premiere, ` ` Break Down the House'' and ` ` Get Off on the Pain.'' ] ABC's Grey's Anatomy returned for its 14th season Thursday, delivering a fast - paced and jam - packed two - hour premiere that featured a few key returns ( onscreen and off ), several nods to its past and one massive bombshell. Kim Raver's Teddy returned to support old friend / crush Owen ( Kevin McKidd ) and his former POW
